Text: How shall I thank you?:) this is a real gem, poetry books don't come everyday...

What a wealth of prose! I love living in this day and age when the poorest of us can be showered with the gems from the library of Alexandria. Thanks you so much for all your hard work and unstinting generosity. And 206 seeders with 159 leeches just goes to show good poetry is alive and well and just waiting in the aisles to obliterate twitter and newspeak.
Thank you so much for this! :-)
Thank you all! pay attention to future addendums. If you have a suggestion about something that is missing, leave a message.
Very nice indeed. Thanks a lot.
wow!!! I just looked at the list and it took my breath away..Thank you STBGD!! This is highly appreciated!!
